    Modular Theta Series public static void acb_modular_theta_series(ComplexPolynomial theta1, ComplexPolynomial theta2, ComplexPolynomial theta3, ComplexPolynomial theta4, ComplexPolynomial z, Complex tau, int len, int prec) {
    static void
    Functions.sl(Complex t, int prec, int order, ComplexPolynomial z)
    lemniscate sine: z=int(1/(1-t^4),t=0..sl(z)) sl(x) = q(1,x)/q(3,x)
    where
    q(k,x) = theta[k](G*x;exp(-x))
    and
    G = M(1,sqrt(2) = Gauss's constant
    where M(a,b) is the arithmetic-geometric-mean of 1 and the square root of 2
